column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have been here few years ago and loved it then. Visited it again last night and I liked it. Their service and staff is greaaaat
column2: whatever we requested to staff may it be seating or food request they accommodated it. However
column3: we ordered peach sangria pitched and felt like there is literally no booze in it. Also
column4: as a vegetarian I did not find much tempting options in their vegetarian section and whatever we ordered was okay and not too great.
